type.name: time_interval_item
type.description: This select is a place holder for assignments of time interval to elements of product data

type.name: time_interval_organization_or_person_in_organization_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Time_interval.

entity.name: Time_interval
entity.description: A Time_interval represents a span of time.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identification of the interval assigned by the organization.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the interval is known.

explicit.name: duration
explicit.description: the optional length of the time interval.

explicit.name: start
explicit.description: the start date or date and time for the time interval.

explicit.name: end
explicit.description: the optional end date or date and time for the time interval.

inverse.name: identifier
inverse.description: the organization (or person in an organization) that assigned and owns the interval id.

where.label: WR1
where.description: the duration and end_date may not both exist.

entity.name: Time_interval_assignment
entity.description: A Time_interval_assignment assigns a Time_interval to product data.

explicit.name: assigned_interval
explicit.description: the Time_interval to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which the Time_interval is assigned.
